006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyConstraintSet;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyTargetedConstraints;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultConstraintSet;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultScopedContraints;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FieldTargetedConstraints;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FlagTargetedConstraints;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IModelConstrained;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IScopedContraints;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IValueConstrained;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ValueConstraintSet;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.ConstraintXmlSupport;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser.Handler;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Scope;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
033import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
034
035import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
036import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlCursor;
037import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
038import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlObject;
039import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
040import org.apache.xmlbeans.impl.values.XmlValueNotSupportedException;
041
042import java.io.IOException;
043import java.net.URI;
044import java.util.Deque;
045import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
046import java.util.LinkedList;
047import java.util.List;
048import java.util.Map;
049import java.util.Set;
050
051import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
052
053/**
054 * Provides methods to load a constraint set expressed in XML.
055 * <p>
056 * Loaded constraint instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
057 * every use. Any constraint set imported is also loaded and cached
058 * automatically.
059 */
060@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
061public class XmlConstraintLoader
062    extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
063    implements IConstraintLoader {
064
065  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
066  @NonNull
067  private static final Map<IEnhancedQName,
068      Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>>> SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING = ObjectUtils.notNull(
069          Map.ofEntries(
070              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.ASSEMBLY_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly),
071              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.FIELD_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField),
072              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.FLAG_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag)));
073
074  @NonNull
075  private static final XmlObjectParser<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> SCOPE_PARSER
076      = new XmlObjectParser<>(SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING) {
077
078        @Override
079        protected Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> identifyHandler(XmlCursor cursor, XmlObject obj) {
080          Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> retval;
081          if (obj instanceof Scope.Assembly) {
082            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly;
083          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Field) {
084            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField;
085          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Flag) {
086            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag;
087          } else {
088            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format("Unhandled element type '%s'.", obj.getClass().getName()));
089          }
090          return retval;
091        }
092
093      };
094
095  @Override
096  protected List<IConstraintSet> parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
097      throws IOException {
098
099    // parse this metaschema
100    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject = parseConstraintSet(resource);
101
102    // now check if this constraint set imports other constraint sets
103    int size = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS().sizeOfImportArray();
104    Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraints;
105    if (size == 0) {
106      importedConstraints = CollectionUtil.emptySet();
107    } else {
108      try {
109        importedConstraints = new LinkedHashSet<>();
110        for (METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Import imported : xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS()
111            .getImportList()) {
112          URI importedResource = URI.create(imported.getHref());
113          importedResource = ObjectUtils.notNull(resource.resolve(importedResource));
114          importedConstraints.addAll(loadInternal(importedResource, visitedResources));
115        }
116      } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
117        throw new IOException(ex);
118      }
119    }
120
121    // now create this constraint set
122    return CollectionUtil.singletonList(new DefaultConstraintSet(
123        ISource.externalSource(resource),
124        parseScopedConstraints(xmlObject, resource),
125        importedConstraints));
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema constraints.
130   *
131   * @param resource
132   *          the resource to parse
133   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema contraints
134   * @throws IOException
135   *           if a parsing error occurred
136   */
137  @NonNull
138  private static METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument parseConstraintSet(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
139    try {
140      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
141      options.setBaseURI(resource);
142      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
143      return ObjectUtils.notNull(METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(), options));
144    } catch (XmlException ex) {
145      throw new IOException(ex);
146    }
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Parse individual constraint definitions from the provided XMLBeans object.
151   *
152   * @param xmlObject
153   *          the XMLBeans object
154   * @param resource
155   *          the resource containing the constraint content
156   * @return the scoped constraint definitions
157   */
158  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops") // intentional
159  @NonNull
160  protected List<IScopedContraints> parseScopedConstraints(
161      @NonNull METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject,
162      @NonNull URI resource) {
163    List<IScopedContraints> scopedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
164
165    StaticContext.Builder builder = StaticContext.builder()
166        .baseUri(resource);
167
168    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS constraints = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS();
169
170    constraints.getNamespaceBindingList().stream()
171        .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
172            ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()), ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
173
174    builder.useWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted(true);
175
176    ISource source = ISource.externalSource(resource);
177
178    for (Scope scope : constraints.getScopeList()) {
179      assert scope != null;
180
181      List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = new LinkedList<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
182      try {
183        SCOPE_PARSER.parse(source, scope, Pair.of(source, targetedConstraints));
184      } catch (MetapathException | XmlValueNotSupportedException ex) {
185        if (ex.getCause() instanceof MetapathException) {
186          throw new MetapathException(
187              String.format("Unable to compile a Metapath in '%s'. %s",
188                  source.getSource(),
189                  ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
190              ex);
191        }
192        throw ex;
193      }
194
195      URI namespace = ObjectUtils.notNull(URI.create(scope.getMetaschemaNamespace()));
196      String shortName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(scope.getMetaschemaShortName());
197
198      scopedConstraints.add(new DefaultScopedContraints(
199          namespace,
200          shortName,
201          CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(targetedConstraints)));
202    }
203    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(scopedConstraints);
204  }
205
206  private static void handleScopedAssembly(
207      @NonNull ISource source,
208      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
209      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
210    Scope.Assembly assembly = (Scope.Assembly) obj;
211
212    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet(source);
213    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, assembly, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
214
215    state.getRight().add(new AssemblyTargetedConstraints(
216        source,
217        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(assembly.getTarget()),
218        constraints));
219  }
220
221  private static void handleScopedField( // NOPMD false positive
222      @NonNull ISource source,
223      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
224      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
225    Scope.Field field = (Scope.Field) obj;
226
227    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet(source);
228    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, field, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
229
230    state.getRight().add(new FieldTargetedConstraints(
231        source,
232        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(field.getTarget()),
233        constraints));
234  }
235
236  private static void handleScopedFlag( // NOPMD false positive
237      @NonNull ISource source,
238      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
239      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
240    Scope.Flag flag = (Scope.Flag) obj;
241
242    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet(source);
243    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, flag, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
244
245    state.getRight().add(new FlagTargetedConstraints(
246        source,
247        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(flag.getTarget()),
248        constraints));
249  }
250}
